query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN membershipType ENUM('resident', 'domiciled', 'landowner') AFTER verificationStatus,
ADD COLUMN street VARCHAR(255) AFTER membershipType,
ADD COLUMN streetNumber VARCHAR(20) AFTER street,
ADD COLUMN zipCode VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT '00030' AFTER streetNumber,
ADD COLUMN municipality ENUM('san_cesareo', 'zagarolo') AFTER zipCode,
ADD COLUMN householdSize INT AFTER municipality,
ADD COLUMN hasMinors BOOLEAN DEFAULT false AFTER householdSize,
ADD COLUMN minorsCount INT AFTER hasMinors,
ADD COLUMN hasSeniors BOOLEAN DEFAULT false AFTER minorsCount,
ADD COLUMN seniorsCount INT AFTER hasSeniors,
ADD COLUMN adminRole ENUM('super_admin', 'admin', 'moderator') AFTER seniorsCount,
ADD COLUMN adminPermissions JSON AFTER adminRole,
ADD COLUMN committeeRole ENUM('president', 'vice_president', 'secretary', 'treasurer', 'board_member', 'council_member') AFTER adminPermissions,
ADD COLUMN isInBoard BOOLEAN DEFAULT false AFTER committeeRole,
ADD COLUMN isInCouncil BOOLEAN DEFAULT false AFTER isInBoard,
ADD COLUMN onboardingCompleted BOOLEAN DEFAULT false AFTER isInCouncil,
ADD COLUMN onboardingStep INT DEFAULT 0 AFTER onboardingCompleted;
